subject: following the order problem :
description_text:
Order number: #SSN5577
Hello, I'm replying to the first email I sent you in French. I called UPS
using the tracking number you sent me:  1ZJ455510439174850. I called UPS to
find out more, and apparently this package isn't meant for me. The label
doesn't have the correct address, which is 30 Traverse Pierre Abondance 13011
Marseille, France .and my first name: Pommier Gregory wasn't there.

Furthermore, I've already prepaid the customs fees related to the import of
330.20 DKK, converted to €46.04, for a package that isn't mine, even though
it's the correct tracking number you provided. I contacted UPS, and they
told me that you are responsible for paying any further fees related to my
package, if applicable.

I assume that you, the supplier, have the correct tracking number for the
order: and if there is a customs tax to pay, it is up to you to pay it.

[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our staff sent you an incorrect tracking link. Here is your correct link. Please provide your payment invoice, and we will refund the amount you paid.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510400017299/trackdetails

Thank you for updating the tracking and for your prompt reply.
Here is my invoice:

Le lun. 12 janv. 2026 à 11:30, service@simsonn.com
Hi Grégory,    Okay, I've processed your refund.
